title: Create OfflineQueueService
description:
Create IndexedDB-backed service for queuing offline actions.

## File
app/assets/js/services/offline-queue-service.js

## Features
- init() - Initialize IndexedDB database
- queueAction(type, url, method, data, meta) - Queue for later
- getPendingActions() - Get all pending
- removeAction(id) - Remove completed
- updateActionError(id, error) - Track failures
- syncPendingActions(onProgress) - Process queue when online
- getPendingCount() - For badge display

## Storage
- DB: kmp-offline-queue
- Store: pending-actions
- Indexes: createdAt, type

## Auto-sync
- Listen for window 'online' event
- Process queue with CSRF token
- Dispatch 'offline-sync-complete' event

- Failed actions retain error info
- Progress callback during sync

title: Update Service Worker with versioning and migration
description:
Upgrade service worker to v2.0 with versioning and in-flight migration.

## File
app/webroot/sw.js

## Changes
- Add SW_VERSION constant ('2.0.0')
- Cache name: kmp-mobile-v${SW_VERSION}
- OLD_CACHE_NAMES array for migration

## Install Handler
- Precache critical assets
- skipWaiting() for immediate activation

## Activate Handler
- Migrate entries from old caches to new
- Delete all caches except current version
- clients.claim() for immediate control
- Send SW_UPDATED message to all clients

## Message Handler
- SKIP_WAITING - force activation
- GET_VERSION - return current version
- CACHE_URLS - add to cache

## Migration Strategy
1. Old SW user visits site
2. Browser detects new sw.js
3. New SW installs, activates
4. Copies old cache entries to new versioned cache
5. Deletes old 'offline-cache-activity-card'
6. Notifies clients of update

## Acceptance
- Existing users migrate seamlessly
- No loss of cached data
- Update notification to clients
